actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Rural Development.
Committee on Agriculture requested executive comment from Agriculture Department.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Rural Development, Oversight, and Investigations

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the President should take immediate steps to increase U.S. agricultural exports.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President is encouraged to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to provide Commodity Credit Corporation agricultural stocks as bonuses for agricultural export sales under the Export Enhancement Program, and to pursue negotiations aimed at increasing such overseas sales.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that the President should take immediate steps to increase U.S. agricultural exports.
